channel.title: Has something like this ever happened to you in school before?
channel.description:
ok well I go to school. Theres cops everywhere and they say go to the lower fields. I look at the school. On the front theres theres words in green paint Saying: Hairomodia (Meaning still unknown) and then Bomb Bomb. So i go down to the fields and sit there for 3 hours baking in the sun and then we had to go take 2 finals. Got out at 3:10 And what else I figured out is that there was wierd symbols inside the school and the security camera were painted over.
Sorry for the crappy typing.

item.title: Has something like this ever happened to you in school before?
item.dc:creator: @jcs_double jcs_double
item.description:
@jcs_double wrote:

Some of my friends came to school on the weekend a couple of weeks ago and on monday there were craters about 10cm wide and about 5 cm deep around the school and my friend told my that he did it and told me how to do it, no one else knows.

Read full topic

item.title: Has something like this ever happened to you in school before?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Lol I’ve done so much funny shit, and never gotten in trouble. One time, my teacher had to run something to the office, I ran up to her desk, grabbed her coffee, ran outside, and pissed in it XD. When she came back in, drank a couple sips, and poured it out, ans said must be deCaf or something, we all laughed…

Also, I shit myself during the FCAT (Like SAT’s) on purpose, it was so fucking funny.

item.source: Has something like this ever happened to you in school before?

item.title: Has something like this ever happened to you in school before?
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

well idk the worst thing that happened in my school, but the worst that happened to me was bad. Here it goes, and yes i know im wasting my time but im bored and high… Me and my friend started bombing in school for like 2 months straight. Then we started noticing kids throwing up there whack tags so we kept ragging over them… pretty soon it got so out of control announcments were made saying if the artists were ever cought you will be removed permaneltley and sent to jail. But i didnt listen and then one day i decided to hit up the biggest staircase in our school. At the time i wrote CRON. So i was doing my filly on the wall untill a kid comes up to me and says give me 20 bucks and i wont snitch and i said fuck you and walked away. (but you know what really pisses me off is when people always say snitching is gay and snithers should die and all that shit and look what this kid does.) He calls a hallway monitor over and says “look over there” pointing to my art and then he says “i know the kid who done this, quick hes upstairs in a red and blue shirt” when i heard this me and my freind ran, my friend ran inside the nurse later to get caught and then stupid of me not leaving school, i decided to walk into the lunch room where my shirt was grabbed from behind almost choking me. Mr.Battles was his name and said congradulations you just been giving a free ticket to jail. Got arrested on the spot, searched(they found 4 magnum markers, shoe polisher, and caps, and some art i did on paper), and put into the principles office. Cops asked me all this shit where i live etc etc, and he says we have been looking for, and i said what, he goes your the same CRON thats all over these walls outside. I didnt say anything but the super intendant came, principle, head of the school you name it. But the worst part was having every teacher in the school come up and looking at me saying this was the kid the whole time, but the worser part was that one of the teachers was my cousin witch wasnt good. Got kicked out of school for 5 days, had to attend community service but then bought back to school after court and a hearing because my grades were so good and thats the first time i ever been suspended.
I was fined a total of 4000 something dollars, my mom beat the shit out of me, my dad said “why couldnt you paint downstairs in the basement walls?”… but i got some respect in school cause of all the ups i got hitting that big staircase.
and i still cant find that kid that snitched on me.
~jR

Read full topic

item.title: Has something like this ever happened to you in school before?
item.dc:creator: @Do0mz Do0mz
item.description:
@Do0mz wrote:

My school’s pretty new. It has camera’s on every hall way, up and down stairs. Camera’s outside. Big metal fences. motion censors in ever room and sucurity in the school all night and day. So theres not much of a chance to do things like that and get away with it. Plus you get fined about Â£200 ($400 roughly) for setting off a fire alarm as a prank becuase the fire brigade get called out automaticaly.

item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

[quote=“yna_ajhear5, post:21, topic:3834”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=4721.msg47986#msg47986 date=1150312070]
Our fire alarms spray this dust everywhere, we didn’t see it on the kid but they said they used a blacklight to see it or something. Whatever.

We have our own security, and we also get roadblocks when school’s letting in/out to let all the busses out first.
[/quote]

I think that all fire alarms have these things…Wear gloves.[/quote]

no.all over your clothes…mine didint…but thatnks for the tip…wil change shirt from now on
